name: viosys/vio-db-migration-sw6
description: Shopware plugin to apply project-specific DB-Updates

description.en-GB: Shopware plugin to apply project-specific DB-Updates

compile.run: @sh cd ./../../../ && bin/console plugin:refresh && bin/console plugin:install --activate VioDBMigration  && bin/console plugin:update VioDBMigration
compile.title: install VioDBMigration
